solution_line_template: Kim sold {thursday_boxes}*{multiplier_wednesday} = <<{thursday_boxes}*{multiplier_wednesday}={wednesday_boxes}>>{wednesday_boxes} boxes of cupcakes on Wednesday.
Kim sold {wednesday_boxes}*{multiplier_tuesday} = <<{wednesday_boxes}*{multiplier_tuesday}={tuesday_boxes}>>{tuesday_boxes} boxes of cupcakes on Tuesday.
